attributes.action: Replace Cameron as prime minister, for his constant denegration of our country.
attributes.background:
Whilst I'm sure there are many reasonable arguments for the "Bremain" position on the EU referendum, constantly denegrating our great nation should not feature amongst them. 

At least not from the person who is meant to be leading us. If he's that ashamed of the UK, he should do his own exit.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
